name: Amoeba Blaster
description:
Blast the amoebas and protect your petri dish!

This is my first video game, created in JavaScript using p5js. Apart from the text it is all procedurally generated using the Superformula to draw the amoebas and gunfire.

Works best in Chrome with a mouse. You will automatically face the direction of travel - rotation is locked when firing so you can strafe. Enjoy!
